Text:
Unique is missing even more minutes than the other releases. 1hr 31 minutes vs 1hr 37 (almost 138) verses (IMDB listing) 1hr 43. Don't think much is missing from the 1hr 37 versions as a lot of time is given to ending credits.

But thank you for uploading different choices for us.  This one is just not what I would choose. :)
